thread.title: E. Roger
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by E. Roger

author: E. Roger
title: E. Roger
text:
The sales experience was very positive and friendly. When
a delivery issue came up as a result of a meeting I had to attend, The salesman asked the delivery crew to see if they could accommodate us.
Even with an incredibility full schedule they were able to pull it off
and with a smile.
Thank you all very much
